column4: on a fresh install of a server version what should i run first?
depends what you want to install
you could for example use IE to do that
(not the best tool for the job but you will have it on your windows computer)
it's like ftp, but better, safer
you'd run winscp and tell it the hostname/user/pass of your linux box
there's stuff about root and passwords on http://ubuntuguide.org/ which is really good
